attributes.action: Stop the closure of  southfield road Middlesbrough
attributes.additional_details:
Southfield road is a main artery of
Middlesbrough town, as well as for local
Businesses it is a life line for vulnerable
People when in need of emergency service,
It was a main route for Ambulances and
Fire brigade, blocking the road is adding
Valuable time to reach their destination,
Also local businesses are suffering, the
Traffic is finding other routes that bypass
The area, so please if this effects you
Sign this petition. Thank you
